014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016/**
017 * A representation of a {@link Factory}'s {@linkplain Factory#create(Creation, ReferenceSelector) creation activity}.
018 *
019 * <p>Most {@link Creation} implementations will, and should, also be {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} implementations.
020 * See {@link DefaultCreation} as one arbitrary example.</p>
021 *
022 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
023 */
024public interface Creation<I> extends AutoCloseable, Cloneable {
025
026  /**
027   * Returns the {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} that is in effect (and that is the reason for which this {@link Creation}
028   * has been created), if known, or {@code null} if not.
029   *
030   * @return the {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} that is in effect, or {@code null}
031   *
032   * @nullability Implementations of this method may return {@code null}.
033   */
034  public BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria();
035
036  /**
037   * Clones this {@link Creation} such that the resulting clone will return the supplied {@link BeanSelectionCriteria}
038   * from any invocation of its {@link #beanSelectionCriteria()} method, and, critically, if this {@link Creation}
039   * implementation implements {@link AutoCloseableRegistry}, arranges to have the resulting clone {@linkplain
040   * AutoCloseableRegistry#register(AutoCloseable) registered with} its immediate ancestor (this {@link Creation}) such
041   * that {@linkplain #close() closing} the ancestor (this {@link Creation}) will also {@linkplain #close() close} the
042   * clone.
043   *
044   * <p>If an implementation of this method does not adhere to these requirements, undefined behavior, and possibly
045   * memory leaks, will occur.</p>
046   *
047   * @param beanSelectionCriteria the {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} that is the reason for which the resulting clone is
048   * being requested; may be {@code null}
049   *
050   * @return a clone of this {@link Creation}; never {@code null}
051   *
052   * @see #beanSelectionCriteria()
053   *
054   * @see #close()
055   *
056   * @see AutoCloseableRegistry
057   *
058   * @see AutoCloseableRegistry#register(AutoCloseable)
059   *
060   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
061   */
062  public Creation<I> clone(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria);
063
064  /**
065   * Closes this {@link Creation}, and, if this {@link Creation} implementation implements {@link
066   * AutoCloseableRegistry}, any clones that were {@linkplain AutoCloseableRegistry#register(AutoCloseable) registered
067   * with it}.
068   *
069   * <p>{@link Factory} implementations (and other user-authored code) normally should not invoke this method, and
070   * indeed doing so may result in undefined behavior and/or an {@link IllegalStateException} being thrown.</p>
071   *
072   * <p>Invoking this method during actual creation may cause undefined behavior and/or an {@link IllegalStateException}
073   * to be thrown.</p>
074   *
075   * @exception IllegalStateException if it is not legal yet to close this {@link Creation}
076   *
077   * @see #clone(BeanSelectionCriteria)
078   *
079   * @see AutoCloseableRegistry
080   *
081   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent.
082   *
083   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
084   */
085  // MUST be idempotent
086  // During creation (as opposed to destruction) this method should throw an IllegalStateException.
087  @Override // AutoCloseable
088  public void close();
089
090  /**
091   * Casts this {@link Creation} to the inferred return type and returns it.
092   *
093   * <p>Overrides of this default method must return this {@link Creation} cast to the apppropriate type. Any other
094   * return value will result in undefined behavior.</p>
095   *
096   * @return this {@link Creation}, cast to an appropriate type; never {@code null}
097   *
098   * @exception ClassCastException if the cast could not be performed for any reason
099   */
100  public default <J> Creation<J> cast() {
101    return cast(this);
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Signals that the supplied {@code instance} has been created and is about to be made available for use.
106   *
107   * <p>This method is typically invoked from within a {@link Factory#create(Creation, ReferenceSelector)} implementation
108   * immediately prior to its returning a value.</p>
109   *
110   * <p>The default implementation of this method does nothing.</p>
111   *
112   * @param instance the instance that was created; must not be {@code null}
113   *
114   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code instance} was {@code null}
115   *
116   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code instance} was found to be unsuitable for any reason
117   *
118   * @idempotency Overrides of this method must be idempotent.
119   *
120   * @threadsafety Overrides of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
121   */
122  // MUST be idempotent
123  // For incomplete instances
124  public default void created(final I instance) {
125
126  }
127
128
129  /*
130   * Static methods.
131   */
132
133
134  /**
135   * Casts the supplied {@link Creation} to the inferred return type and returns it.
136   *
137   * @param c the {@link Creation} to cast and return; may be {@code null}
138   *
139   * @return the {@link Creation}, cast to an appropriate type, or {@code null}
140   */
141  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
142  public static <I> Creation<I> cast(final Creation<?> c) {
143    return (Creation<I>)c;
144  }
145
146}
